name: query_races
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool horse_racing.
Tool description: Horse racing API - UK & Ireland races. Racecards, results, stats, Odds comparator and more. 
API description: Queries horse races based on various filter criteria.

order_by_date.description: Results ordered by date of the race, either "asc" for ascending or "desc" for descending.

date_to.description: Upper bound date for the races to be queried.

distance_to.description: Upper bound distance for the races to be queried.

distance_from.description: Lower bound distance for the races to be queried.

id_horse.description: Horse id. If you populate this field the query search races where this horse run.

date_from.description: Lower bound date for the races to be queried.

name.description: Race name or a text on the race name. Like \"Novice\", \"Handicap chase\", \"Hurdle\", ....
